EmailTemplate.subject: The145.com Partners with GoDirectTrade.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=145com]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/repairstation/index/singlesearch/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=145com]]> GoDirect Trade—the aerospace marketplace of the future—has partnered with The145.com to bring R&O capability search data right to your fingertips.
The145.com is the world’s leading provider of detailed repair data for over three million part numbers. They are the only MRO database in the aviation industry focused exclusively on the component R&O market.
The top 10 largest airlines <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/about-us?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=145com]]> in the world are on our marketplace. Register for free on GoDirectTrade.com today!
We make decision making quick and easy. Transparency is king and we are the only marketplace where price, product images and quality documents are required on every listing. Our collaboration with The145.com brings component repair data to the people we care about the most: The Customer.
START A REPAIR P/N SEARCH <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/repairstation/index/singlesearch/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=145com]]>
